about_the_game:
Uprsing: Humanum is a short game where you must overcome a horde of enemies and reach the top of a mysteroius tower

Fast paced combat

Our combat is fast and the tower is not holding back.

Story

Upsiring: Humanum revolves around the big question of the human condition through posthumanistic lens. And the story goes like this:

You and your weapon have reached The Abyss. Instructions are clear, dive into the megastructure and take her heart -wait, her?-. You realise SHE was awake when the combat starts. Overcome the obstacles and find your own path in this frenetic action game.
Will you stare back when The Abyss stares at you?

Would you find the answers that make you take this journey at the top of a tower?... of The Tower?... of her?

Perma-Death

Make each try count, reaching the top is hard. And each time you are killed you will start from the very bottom. This may be hard but nobody said it will be easy.

Metroidvania

Each time you reach a new floor, you will learn a new secret of the tower, this will make you understand her better, and find new hidden locations and connections.

name: Uprising: Humanum

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or superior
  • Processor: I5 or Ryzen 5 or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1650 or superior
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No need
  • VR Support: -
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or superior
  • Processor: I5 or Ryzen 5 or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: No need
  • VR Support: -

short_description: Uprising: Humanum is a knowledge based metroidvania. Follow Aurora in her quest to save the last bastion of Humanity.
